Articles.Content: been trying to find it and it\'s gone. I used to stay logged in that even at work now I don\'t know where to look for news from the dev team, anyone point me to the right thread, thanks

What thread are you talking about? The KSP Development section is still there, just go to the top of the forums and you will see it.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
There was a forum re-shuffle yesterday, which involved a lot of stuff being moved, but the dev thread is now where it usually is-the top stickied thread in the dev forum.
I found it now, what it was, is if you are logged out which I am a lot at work it does not show the forum now, you have to be logged in to see it. Thanks again for the help
